Package org.ginsim.common.utils

Class ColorPalette

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ginsim.common.utils.ColorPalette
  • public class ColorPalette
extends Object
    Some pre-defined color palettes and methods to help generating new ones or manipulating colors in general.
    Author:
    Duncan Berenguier

        Returns:
